headline: Monday.com sinks, ESPN–Fox streaming, US Steel explosion reports
summary: Yahoo Finance Senior Reporter Allie Canal tracks Monday's top moving stocks and biggest market stories in this Market Minute. Monday.com (MNDY) stock is nosediving after the company's quarterly earnings and outlook disappointed investors. Disney's (DIS) ESPN and Fox Corporation (FOX) plan to offer a bundle streaming service package. Multiple reports say that a US Steel plant exploded in Pennsylvania, leaving several people injured. Stay up to date on the latest market action, minute-by-minute, with Yahoo Finance's Market Minute.

headline: ESPN DTC AND FOX ONE TO LAUNCH COMBINED BUNDLE OFFER
summary: ESPN's upcoming direct-to-consumer service and FOX One, Fox Corporation's (Nasdaq: FOXA, FOX; "FOX" or the "Company") wholly-owned direct to consumer streaming service, today announced an agreement that will give consumers the opportunity to purchase the two services bundled together starting October 2 for $39.99 per month.
